isis.stitle: TSI 02-04-01R - Corrosion Resistant Hydraulic Brake Rotors Available Thru Service Parts

subjectgroup.subject: Corrosion Resistant Hydraulic Brake Rotors Available Thru Service Parts

geninfo.para: This TSI applies to all models with hydraulic ABS brakes built after March 1, 1999.

Vehicles with hydraulic brake ABS that are operated in winter environments where highly corrosive de-icing chemicals are used may experience corrosion of the brake rotor. Disc brake rotors with a corrosion resistant coating are now available through Service Parts. These coated rotors are completely interchangeable with non-coated rotors and use the same service procedures.
